data.title: Virus and Worms
data.overview: Worms and viruses, oh my! This phrase appears in several contexts. On the other hand, it may have a great many diverse meanings. These topics will help explain to you the various types of common viruses and worms, what they do, and how you can get them. Viruses and worms are more of an umbrella term that is used for any kind of malicious software that can be found on the Internet.
